mapper.select: SELECT t3.name from sys_users as t1 INNER JOIN sys_user_roles as t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id INNER JOIN sys_roles as t3 on t2.role_id = t3.id where t1.username = #{username};

SELECT t5.permission from sys_users as t1 inner JOIN sys_user_roles as t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id INNER JOIN sys_roles as t3 on t2.role_id = t3.id INNER JOIN sys_role_menus t4 on t3.id = t4.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menus as t5 on t4.menu_id = t5.id WHERE t1.username = #{username};

select count(*) from sys_users
username like concat("%",#{username},"%")
